org.dhbw.geo.database

Class DBActionSimple

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dhbw.geo.database.DBObject
      • org.dhbw.geo.database.DBAction
        • org.dhbw.geo.database.DBActionSimple

  • public class DBActionSimple
extends DBAction
    This class is used for simple actions which just contain one setting which can only be turned on or off. At the current point it supports the following settings: WiFi, Bluetooth.
    Author:
    Matthias

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean status
      the flag whether to turn the setting on (true) or off (false)

      the type for turning on / off WiFi connections

      • DBActionSimple

        public DBActionSimple()

      • DBActionSimple

        public DBActionSimple(long id,
                      java.lang.String type,
                      boolean status,
                      boolean active)
        Creates a new simple action. Use this to create notification actions fetched from the database.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the simple action
        type - the type of the action
        status - the status of the action
        active - the flag whether the action is active

    • Method Detail

      • selectAllFromDB

        public static java.util.ArrayList<DBAction> selectAllFromDB(long ruleId)
        Selects all simple actions from the database which are assigned to a given rule.
        Parameters:
        ruleId - the id of the rule for which the simple actions shall be selected
        Returns:
        an arraylist of the simple actions fetched from the database

        Returns:
